messages.body:
Mr. Sadiq Yusuf
First Atlantic Bank PLC
4/6 Adetokunbo Ademola Street
P. O. Box 75369
Victoria Island, Lagos-Nigeria
Tel: +234-1-2622472 to 6; Tel: 234-1-262249


Dear friend,

This letter may come to you as a surprise due to the
fact that we have 
not yet met.
The message could be strange but real if you pay some
attention to it. 
I could have notified you about it at least for the
sake of your 
integrity. Please accept my sincere apologies. In
bringing this 
message of goodwill to you, I have to say that I have
no intentions of 
causing you any pains.
 
I am Mr. Sadiq Yusuf, Branch Manager, First Atlantic
Bank Plc of 
Nigeria. I managed to get your contact details through
the Internet 
myself. Time is of the importance and I am desperately
looking for a 
person to assist me in this confidential business.
A British oil consultant/contractor with the Nigerian
National 
Petroleum Corporation, Mr. Claude Brian Best made a
numbered time 
(Fixed) Deposit on January 6, 1999, valued at
US$25,000,000.00 
(Twenty- five Million Dollars), for twelve (12)
calender months in my 
branch. Upon maturity, I sent a routine notification
to his forwarding 
address but got no reply.  After a month, we sent a
reminder and 
finally we discovered from his contract employers, the
Nigerian 
National Petroleum Corporation that Mr. Claude Brian
Best died from an 
automobile accident. On further nvestigation, I found
out that he died 
without making a WILL, and all attempts to trace his
next of kin was 
fruitless.
 
I therefore made further investigation and discovered
that Mr. Claude 
Brian Best did not declare any kin or relations in all
his official 
documents, including his Bank Deposit paperwork in my
Bank. This sum 
of US$25,000,000.00 is still sitting in my Bank and
the interest is 
being rolled over with the principal sum at the end of
each year.  No 
one will ever come forward to claim it.
According to Nigerian Law, at the
expiration of 6  (six) years, the money will revert to
the ownership 
of the Nigerian Government if nobody applies to claim
the fund.

Consequently, my proposal is that I will like you as a
foreigner to 
stand in as the next of kin to Mr. Claude Brian Best
so that the 
fruits of this old man's labor will not get into the
hands of some 
corrupt government officials.  This is simple, I will
like you to 
provide immediately your full names and address so
that the attorney 
will prepare the necessary documents and affidavits
that will put you 
in place as the next of kin.  We shall employ the
service of two 
lawyers for drafting and notarization of the WILL and
to obtain the 
necessary documents and letter of
probate/administration in your favor 
for the transfer.  A bank account in any part of the
world that you 
will provide will then facilitate the transfer of this
money to you as 
the beneficiary/next of kin.  The money will be paid
into your account 
for us to share in the ratio of 60% for me and 40% for
you.

There is no risk at all as all the paperwork for this
transaction will 
be done by the attorney and my position as the Branch
Manager 
guarantees the successful execution of this
transaction. If you are 
interested, please reply immediately via the private
email address 
below;

s_yusuf_1@indiatimes.com

Upon your response, I shall then provide you with more
details and 
relevant documents that will help you understand the
transaction.

Please observe utmost confidentiality, and rest
assured that this 
transaction would be most profitable for both of us
because I shall 
require your assistance to invest my share in your
country.

Awaiting your urgent reply via my email address.

Thanks and regards.

Mr. Sadiq Yusuf

messages.body:
Dear Sadiq,

First of all, I am glad you were able to obtain my
private email address.  It shows that you are a
resourceful young man.  

Your proposal interests me.  I like the fact that we
are taking the moral high ground by not allowing the
fruits of this man's labor to go into some corrupt
government official's hands.  We are so much more
qualified than those scoundrels.  Please fill me in
all the modalities or, even better, the perfected
modalities.

One word of caution:  as you probably know, I am a
retired Archbishop with considerable resources at my
disposal.  As such, this matter must remain strictly
confidential between us.  As some of my former
colleagues used to say, it will be our little secret. 
If you do not believe you can keep the appropriate
discretion, feel free to look for another partner.

I look forward to your response,

Archbishop Papageno della Tetamenta
President Emeritus,
Banco Vaticano

ADDRESS)


Dear Sadiq,

Let's get some things straight from the beginning.  I
don't know what church you belong to, but you
obviously are not an Orthodox of the Benevolent
Lacedemonian Order of the Ancient Observance
(Unreformed).  I see that you are not familiar with
the titles and privileges that my position carries. 
This is not the time for a full indoctrination, but
from now on you will address me by my formal title,
which is "Your Scamosity".  Please keep it in mind.  I
have learned that familiarity breeds contempt, and
mutual respect is essential to a successful business
relationship.

I am going to open a new bank account for the specific
purposes of this transaction.  For obvious reasons, I
am not going to use my own bank.  The more I distance
myself from these proceedings the better.  I will send
you the details as soon as I have them available.

How are we going to prove that I am Mr. Best's next of
kin?  I do not share his last name or even his
nationality.  Do I need to create a family tree or
something to that effect?  Please get back to me as
soon as possible.

Regards,

Arch. Papageno Della Tetamenta

discussed, and the account is temporarily locked

precautions, since I had to open a Special Super-Sized
account in order to hold the amounts involved.

messages.body:
Dear Sadiq,

I just arrived to Rome and I am writing to you in a
hurry, since I am on my way to an audience with the
Pope.

I do not have a private phone or fax, and it is
unlikely that I will find one that has the required
conditions of privacy and security.  You see, I am
staying at the Borgia house with my niece Lucrezia, a
very nosy woman.  Even though she is Italian, she is
also a cunning linguist among other talents, and could
easily eavesdrop in our conversations.  For the time
being, email is the safest way of communicating.

I will get in touch with the attorney as soon as I am
back from the Vatican.  By the way, are you sure this
barrister guy is trustworthy?  

Regards, 

Archbishop Papageno Della Tetamenta

messages.subject: URGENT
messages.body:
Hello, Sadiq

I just came back from a very busy weekend at the
Vatican.  I have some important developments to tell
you, but first I need to know a few things about you.

First, are you a Christian?  If not, what is your
religion?  Please do not get me wrong.  There are no
"right" or "wrong" answers.   I just need your
information in order to send you the correct version
of the secrecy oath you must take.  This should give
you an idea of the magnitude of the news I am about to
communicate.

Second, are you willing to keep my business in
absolute confidence?  I think it is only fair, since I
am doing the same for you.

Third, how long will it take for us to get the money
out of Nigeria?  Timing is very important, as you will
see very soon.

I received an email from the second lawyer, asking for
my basic information.  I was very impressed by the
professionalism he displays in his email.  I hope we
get along well.

Please write back to me as soon as possible, we need
to get going right away

Regards,

Archbishop Papageno Della Tetamenta

messages.body:
Dear Sadiq,

Thank you for getting back to me so quickly.  I am
realizing that you will be a valuable and trusted ally
in out future projects, as well as the current one.

However, I am terribly troubled by the ineptitude of
the lawyer you have selected.  I am referring to the
first one, not Barrister Martins.

I am very happy I caught this before I sent flawed
papers to Tony.  Please take a look at the will this
moron of a lawyer wrote for us.  (Will2.doc).  My
address is all wrong.  There is no Palazzo Piazza Pio
XII in Roma.  Do you realize that writing the
incorrect 
address in a legal document can bring us all sorts of
problems later on?  

I cannot believe you paid over 25,000 dollars to this
guy to write four pieces of paper, and he made such a
major mistake in one of them.  I had to study law when
I was attending Archbishop Academy, and the first
lesson they teach you is to make sure you get all of
your client information correct.  I hope you get a
refund from this nitwit.

In order to speed the process I could just change the
address myself and send it to Tony, but I do not want
to make that decision without your approval.  Should I
do it that way or should we force the lawyer to amend
the will?  Please let me know how to proceed.


Regards,

Archbishop Papageno Della Tetamenta

messages.subject: ALL IS FORGIVEN
messages.body:
My friend,

There cannot be grudges between partners.  All is
forgiven and forgotten.  You have showed the marks of
a true man:  to recognize one's mistakes.  My trust in
you has doubled because of your courageous message.

Ignore the message I sent Tony, I am trying to buy us
some time.

As you probably know, he is asking for almost 8,000
dollars.  Since you have decided to give me 40% of the

proceeds and keep 60% for yourself, it is only fair
that we share the expenses as well.  Let me know your
thoughts on this.

Regards,

Archbishop Papageno Della Tetamenta

messages.subject: HOPE IS ON THE WAY
messages.body:
Hello, my friend

Aw, shucks.  Please do not mention it anymore.  We
need to look forward.

If I understand your original email correctly, the
will has an expiration date of six years, so a few
more days will not do us any harm.

There are very important develoments from my side.  If
everything goes according plan, I will be in
conditions to afford the full payment Tony has
requested by the beginning of next week.

Before I can fill you in with the details, I need two
things from you.  First take a look at these two
articles.  It will give you a quick background at what
is at stake here.

http://www.mccw-usa.org/news/article21.html

http://www.cwnews.com/news/viewstory.cfm?recnum=24668

In second place, I need you to return the following
oath of allegiance to me.  Just add your full name,
place and date of birth, and current address at the
end.  For your convenience I am enclosing the English
translation as well.


Please do not take this oath lightly.  It will be
extremely disrespectful to my beliefs, and the future
of our relationship depends on it.  

Your partner,

Archbishop Papageno Della Tetamenta

messages.subject: Re: METHOD OF PAYMENT.
messages.body:
Dear Tony,

Forgive me for second guessing your motives, but I
have quite a bit of experience with international
transactions.  I have learned that credit card is
usually the most secure method of payment.  Are you
unwilling to use it because of the transaction fee
that the card company charges?  If that is the case, I
am willing to pay the extra fee involved, which is
usually about 4 percent of the total amount.  The
peace of mind is well worth the expense.

I can use any of the major credit cards, including
Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Diners Club.

Please get back to me as soon as possible,

Archbishop Papageno Della Tetamenta

messages.subject: GREAT NEWS!!!!!!
messages.body:
Dear Sadiq,

I am now in position to tell you the whole story. 
Remember, I have your binding oath of loyalty, make
sure you keep this to yourself.

Due to the Pope's poor health (remember the articles I
sent you?) the archbishops and cardinals decided to
hold a secret election (conclave) to choose the
successor to the Pontif.  

After some maneuvering, and with the help of the
Secretary of State of the Vatican, I obtained the
majority of the votes, and have been therefore elected
as the future Pope.  

You must understand that very few people has access to
this information, and the news will not be made public
for a while.  However, the nomination is official, and
I have accepted it with the name of Sixtus VI.

In my new position I am now able to get the funding we
need, and am ready to proceed.  I will need you to
resend me the email address of Tony, somehow I must
have deleted it from my contact list.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, I
primise you will not be disappointed.

I look forward to your response,

Sixtus VI


PS: my new position has the formal title of "Your
Holiness".  It is an ancient tradition, please
remember to use it in your correspondence.

Dear Sadiq,

I am now in position to tell you the whole story. Remember, I have your binding oath of loyalty, make sure you keep this to yourself.

Due to the Pope's poor health (remember the articles I sent you?) the archbishops and cardinals decided to hold a secret election (conclave) to choose the successor to the Pontif.

After some maneuvering, and with the help of the Secretary of State of the Vatican, I obtained the majority of the votes, and have been therefore elected as the future Pope.

You must understand that very few people has access to this information, and the news will not be made public for a while. However, the nomination is official, and I have accepted it with the name of Sixtus VI.

In my new position I am now able to get the funding we need, and am ready to proceed. I will need you to resend me the email address of Tony, somehow I must have deleted it from my contact list.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, I primise you will not be disappointed.

I look forward to your response,

Sixtus VI

PS: my new position has the formal title of "Your Holiness". It is an ancient tradition, please remember to use it in your correspondence.
